Name: The secret of FYNDEMOOR Park
About the game: The Secret of FYNDEMOOR Park a game so big only the pc can hold it . You are Foster a would be gangster...something is a foot in this city and its up to you to find out what`s what! A graphic adventure game that`s never been so easy using the retro game engine system walking talking, taking is as simple as pointing the cursor and pressing a button . The secret of FYNDEMOOR Park offers adventure gamers a new kind of story telling experience that includes complex puzzles and conversations and side splitting humour . Available from CRAZY EYE MEDIA The secret of FYNDEMOOR Park sets new standards for pc gaming. KEY FEATURES 16-bit Retro Arcade graphics Classic CRT-TV screen 90`s aesthetics Classic point and click adventure Satire of the decade with Politically incorrect humour Aliens, talking horse`s, swinger`s party`s ,flying mermaids plus loads more entertainment Go on a daring adventure in your attempt to become the most infamous gangster in FYNDEMOOR city Intuitive game interface and controls provide a more interactive gameplay experience Intentional in game bugs and comical glitches followed by badly scripted animations to give the game a authentic 90`s Charm ... that sets it apart from the rest The first and only 16-bit arcade point and click adventure game
